de.nec.nle.siafu.externalCommand
Class CommandListener

java.lang.Object
  de.nec.nle.siafu.externalCommand.CommandListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class CommandListener
extends Object
implements Runnable

This class listens on the configured port (by default 4444/TCP) for user commands. These are divided in two types

  • Context retrieval commands
  • Simulator GUI interaction

You may use this interface to issue commands, or you can make your own wrapper around it. At the time of release, a Web Service wrapper is provided.

For detailed information on the commands, just run Siafu, and telnet into port 4444. You'll get an interactive help.

Author:
Miquel Martin

Method Detail

die

public void die()
Method to pack up and die when the simulator quits.

run

public void run()
Start listening for commands. When one is received, parse it, and pass it to the command processor, who will react on it.

Specified by:
run in interface Runnable
